short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays Soulja Boy when you go to Reddit or Imgur to dissuade you from doing so.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Operant conditioning is a form of learning in which an individual's behavior is modified by its consequences.

This extension demonstrates operant conditioning to help and individual stop using the extremely addicting website, reddit.com. To discourage the user from viewing Reddit.com, it will play Soulja Boy when they are viewing any site with reddit or imgur in the url.


Based on an idea by a lovely BGSU student.
